comment: Take this course!! The textbook is online and easy to understand, and although the tests are a little bit long (50 questions), if you read the material you'll do fine. Professor Ferreira is very understanding and responds quickly to emails.

TAKE HER ONLINE. She is so kind and understanding. Also answers emails and any questions very quickly. Get ready to do a lot of work tho. Multiple modules and assignments each week.
